text: Citigroup Inc reshuffled the leadership in for its U.S. consumer bank on Tuesday, according to a memo seen by Reuters.Gonzalo Luchetti, who most recently led the consumer bank in Europe and Asia will become US Consumer bank head effective next month, according to the memo signed by Global consumer bank head Anand Selva.Additionally, effective May 1, current Head of US retail banking David Chubak will switch positions with US retail services head Craig Vallorano.
